Title: Tax Justice Network Podcasts
Description: Developed a customized audio player using web components and vanilla JavaScript. Leveraged the observer design pattern to enable precise control of single-player instances, while seamlessly transmitting events to various UI components for enhanced functionality.

Title: Social Workers Defenders
Description: Managed data preprocessing and augmentation using Python and Pandas for a University of Essex research dataset. Implemented interactive data visualization on a global map using Mapbox.js. Developed the application using React.js and integrated custom endpoints with WordPress CMS for backend support.

Title: BasedOn
Description: Designed visual identity and structured information architecture for BasedOn service website. Incorporated SVG animations and crafted flow presentations using DOM elements. Developed the website using Nuxt.js, ensuring static export and SEO optimization.

Title: MyIndex
Description: Design and develop both the landing page and frontend of the dashboard application for MyIndex. This SaaS platform offers context-based search functionality for document retrieval. My responsibilities include crafting intuitive user interfaces, implementing responsive design principles, and ensuring seamless interaction. My aim is to enhance the overall user experience and functionality of the platform.

Title: Gaiasense
Description: Full-stack development of a custom WordPress theme utilizing vanilla JavaScript. Implemented frontend features and functionality while ensuring seamless integration with WordPress backend systems

Title: Machine Learning Vibe Captions
Description: Developed a pivotal component for my Master's thesis project. Engineered a data scraper using Node.js and TypeScript, seamlessly integrating with a Spring Boot application for real-time data storage. Curated and processed a dataset comprising sound files and metadata, focusing on pre-processing and cleaning. Implemented a custom deep learning model using PyTorch and TorchAudio, with TensorBoard for training progress monitoring. Primarily focused on single-task binary classification for genre prediction in the initial phase.

Title: Stegi Radio
Description: Engineered custom audio players for seamless sound streaming and integration with Mixcloud service. Employed Vuex for efficient state management, ensuring precise control over single player instances. Designed UI and developed a custom CMS for radio station services, featuring image upload functionality and versatile UI module handling.

Title: Localwatch
Description: Focused on front-end development, consuming API calls from Laravel backend. Integrated plots using Highcharts.js and crafted reusable DOM intersection components, enhancing overall user interaction and data visualization.

Title: Climatebook
Description: Implemented parallax scroll module using vanilla JavaScript for enhanced visual effects. Created counter animations to engage users dynamically. Utilized router transitions to ensure smooth transitions between page loads, enhancing overall user experience.

Title: Ioanna Paraskevopoulou
Description: UI design and identity development. Executed full-stack development in WordPress. Implemented a billboard component using vanilla JS for horizontal infinite text animation.

Title: Ioanna Vlachaki
Description: Directed UI design and executed full-stack WordPress development. Implemented parallel inverted scrolling on a dual layout using vanilla JS for enhanced user experience.

Title: Skag Inspires
Description: Developed a web component for parallax scrolling on DOM elements, SVGs, and images. Utilized diverse parameters like speed, easing, and rotation for dynamic visual effects.

Title: Ebrains
Dev: Bracket x Athena Research & Innovation Center
Description: Developed a Vue.js-based UI kit featuring reusable components. Created dashboard layouts with extensive nesting for enhanced usability and flexibility.

Title: Konstanza Kapsali
Description: Designed and developed a portfolio website showcasing the work of artist and filmmaker Konstanza Kapsali.

Title: SND Module
Description: Developed a web component using vanilla JavaScript, leveraging custom elements to optimize user experience while managing SoundCloud widgets for enhanced music playback functionality.

Title: Viewpal
Description: Implemented the front end of Viewpal, a SaaS platform offering virtual tours worldwide, using Nuxt.js. Integrated video streaming services and developed user dashboards for seamless user interaction

Title: Ecodialogues
Description: Crafted a web component in vanilla JavaScript that dynamically modifies the DOM based on user selections, facilitating comment functionality inspired by the Medium platform. Users can select specific text, apply comments, reply to existing comments, and overlap selections seamlessly, without disrupting the markup structure.

Title: Hyperlands
Description: Crafted an experimental prototype, serving as both a mood board and navigation sketch, as part of research on near-death experience events. Utilized React.js to create a non-linear structured scenario inspired by the Fibonacci sequence, allowing users to navigate through geometric shapes in a 3D rendering environment.

Title: TILT Platform
Description: Designed the visual identity and user interface for TILT platform, an artist collective specializing in art exhibitions and research.

Title: Animmma
Description: Developed an interactive prototype showcasing a user interface where users input terms to generate an infinite mixtape using an AI model. Implemented using Vue.js for seamless functionality.

Title: Tzagarakis
Description: Executed full-stack development for a dynamic portfolio website, incorporating interactive 3D elements using the Three.js library, enhancing user engagement through mouse-driven interactions.

Title: Federica Scalisse
Description: Crafted a dynamic static website portfolio for illustrator and architect Federica Scalisse, elevating user experience through seamless navigation and captivating illustration animations within the single-page application interface.

Title: Mythogram: Underwatchful eyes
Description: Crafted a personal A/V installation promo website, showcasing interactive features and utilizing a 3D model based on the main video component of the artwork. Employed the Three.js library to seamlessly control the 3D model directly within the browser interface, enhancing user engagement and inviting them to the exhibition.

Title: Topio
Dev: Bracket x Athena Research & Innovation Center
Description: Developed the front end of a public website and dashboard interface, incorporating data visualizations using Highcharts. Utilized Vue.js with TypeScript support, adhering to object-oriented programming (OOP) code style for efficient development and maintenance.

Title: Spaces of Faux Intimacies
Description: Developed an archival website showcasing artists from the 'Spaces of Faux Intimacies' exhibition in Berlin. Built as a single-page application using Vue.js, with custom endpoints and API calls integrated via WordPress CMS.

Title: Nutu
Description: Full-stack development of a custom WordPress theme, implementing AJAX calls to enable infinite scrolling functionality."
